@1@ Replaces the error code and corresponding category with those representing error code enum {{c|e}}.
&lt;!----&gt;
Equivalent to {{c|1=*this = make_error_code(e)}}, where {{tt|make_error_code}} is only found by [[cpp/language/adl|argument-dependent lookup]].
&lt;!----&gt;
{{cpp/enable_if|{{c|std::is_error_code_enum&lt;ErrorCodeEnum&gt;::value}} is {{c|true}}}}.

@2,3@ Implicitly defined copy-assignment operator and move-assignment operator assign the contents of {{c|other}} to {{c|*this}}.
